REUTERS.UNKNOWN: A RM f2633 reute u f BC-ASSETS-OF-U.S.-MONEY 04-09 0074

TEXT.TITLE: ASSETS OF U.S. MONEY FUNDS ROSE IN WEEK
TEXT.BODY: Assets of money market mutual funds increased 1.39 billion dlrs in the week ended yesterday to 236.77 billion dlrs, the Investment Company Institute said. Assets of 93 institutional funds were up 481.1 mln dlrs to 65.65 billion dlrs, 93 broker-dealer funds rose 285.3 mln dlrs to 107.31 billion dlrs, and 197 general purpose funds gained 625.5 mln dlrs to 63.8 billion dlrs. Reuter
